issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Phone>Contacts>contact images, I chose a contact with images (Thanks Dawson) and the image appeared as expected. A second attempt to choose a contact with no image resulted in the text, "no image' appearing, but the previous image was present. See screenshot.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on Nexus S
2) Navigate to Phone>Contacts>contact images
3) With the device in portrait, click "Set landscape"
4) Click "open window"

Result:
The UI rotates to Portrait, then the window opens in portrait.

Expected result:
The UI remains in landscape and the window opens in landscape.
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Phone>Contacts>contact images choosing a contact with image and then another without displays the image from the first contact selected.
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on Nexus S 2.3.4

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
